item.amethyst_imbuement.golden_heart.too: You can hear it beating softly...
item.amethyst_imbuement.ametrine.tooltip: You feel secure with it in your hand
item.amethyst_imbuement.crystalline_hear: Its faint heartbeat sounds like windchimes
item.amethyst_imbuement.celestine.toolti: It shimmers with infinite sublime hues
item.amethyst_imbuement.brilliant_diamon: This diamond shines with an inner glow
item.amethyst_imbuement.copper_ring.tool: You feel lighter on your feet wearing it
Your steps feel longer wearing it
item.amethyst_imbuement.copper_amulet.to: You feel energized with it around your neck
item.amethyst_imbuement.imbued_ring.tool: Its warmth makes you feel safe
It blankets you in a comforting glow
item.amethyst_imbuement.imbued_amulet.to: It is a reassuring presence on your chest
item.amethyst_imbuement.iridescent_orb.t: Thousands of truths echo across its surface
Millions of realities reflect in its depths
item.amethyst_imbuement.heartstone.toolt: It pulses gently in your hand
item.amethyst_imbuement.mana_potion.tool: Restore your scepter and other magical items
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.wasting.d: Damaged enemies are inflicted with slowness.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.deadly_sh: Increases crossbow and sniper bow range and damage.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.resilienc: Adds one armor point per piece per level.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.insight.d: Mobs drop additional experience when killed.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lifesteal: Heals the user when attacking an enemy.
Axes deal additional damage and disable shields on hit.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.bulwark.d: Heals the user when blocking an attack
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.rain_of_t: On hit, arrow spawns additional arrows that radiate from the target.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lightfoot: No longer sink in powdered snow or trample crops.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.vein_mine: Mines mulptiple blocks in an area when a keybind is held.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shielding: Enhances the innate shielding of the worn jewelry.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.angelic.d: Enables creative flight while the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.crystalli: Increases weapon damage. Stacks with other damage enchantments.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.draconic_: Locate nearby ores with the vision of a dragon!
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.escape.de: Using the totem teleports the holder to the surface.
Endermen and piglins will not bother the wearer.
Summons a Crystalline Golem as aid when the holders health is low.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.hasting.d: Grants the holder Haste while the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.headhunte: Inflicts massive damage upon landing a headshot.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.illuminat: Grants the user Night Vision when scoped in.
The user is immune from negative status effects.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.invisibil: Renders the wearer invisible, and the armor piece does not reduce the invisibility effectiveness.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.moonlit.d: The user gains Strength and Resistance during the night.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.slimy.des: Protects from fall damage and bounces the wearer like a slime block.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soulbindi: Inventory is not lost upon death.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soul_of_t: Grants the holder Conduit Power while in water and the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spectral_: Highlights nearby enemies with a spectral glow.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spiked.de: Damages the blocked attacker like Thorns.
Grants Strength while the totem is active.
Provides step assist, allowing movement up one block without jumping.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.suntouche: The user gains Strength and Speed during the day.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.undying.d: Totem acts like a Totem of Undying.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.magic_mis: A simple bolt of damaging energy.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soul_miss: A bolt of energy that pierces armor.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.attuned.d: Reduces the mana cost of spells cast by scepters.
Nearby enemies stop attacking and grants Hero of the Village.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.cleanse.d: Removes negative statuses and grants temporary immunity.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.comet_sto: Summons a storm of comets from above to rain destruction on an area.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.dash.desc: Dashes the user similarly to Riptide.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fang_barr: Summons three waves of evoker fangs.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fangs.des: Summons a row of evoker fangs.
Launches a fireball in the direction cast.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.flamebolt: A fiery bolt of energy. Lights target on fire.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.flamewave: A rapid-fire assault of flaming bolts. Lights targets on fire.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.forcefiel: Places a forcefield the user can pass through but harmful entities can't.
A frosty bolt of energy that chills the target and nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.gusting.d: Knocks back all enemies in a swath in front of the user.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.abundance: Bonemeals nearby crops and harvests when mature.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.hard_ligh: Summons a row of glassy blocks in front of the user.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.levitatin: Bombards nearby enemies with shulker bullets.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lightning: Strikes a nearby target with a lightning bolt.
Strikes all nearby enemies with a persistent storm of lightning.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_clea: Removes negative status effects from nearby players and grants temporary immunity.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_exha: Weakens and slows all nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_fort: Grants Strength and Resistance to nearby players.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_heal: Heals nearby players. More heal than minor heal.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_revi: Regenerates, Heals, Cleanses, and grants Absoprtion to nearby players.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mend_equi: Repairs damaged equipment in the users inventory.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.minor_hea: Heals target. Amount healed increases with level.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.regenerat: Grants Regeneration. Duration increases with level.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spectral_: An energy slash that damages all enemies in front of the caster.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_bl: Summons blazes to assist the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_ch: Summons chickens to aid the caster in battle ;).
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_go: Summons a Crystalline Golem to aid the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_st: Summons a strider to aid the caster in transit.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_zo: Summons zombies to aid the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.withering: Summons a wither skull and casts it at the enemy.
container.imbuing_table.level_low: Scepter level too low for this augment
lore_book.null: No level requirement for this spell
augment_damage.check_can_use: Not enough durability to use augment!
augment_damage.guardian.check_can_use: Not enough durability to summon a guardian!
